How have I built this website?

General

  • Built with: Jekyll
  • Hosting service: GitHub Pages
  • Domain provider: Namecheap
  • PDF: LaTeX on Overleaf

Libraries

  • Table of content: Tocify.js
  • Mathematics: mathjax
  • Pseudocode: Pseudocode.js and KaTeX
  • JavaScript: jQuery
  • CSS: Bootstrap

Inspirations and Credits

  • Overall content: Gwern Branwen
  • Overall design: Wikipedia
  • Display image: Artist
